Description: Combine fire and water to create a burst of scalding steam.
Send a wave of boiling water towards your enemies.
Create a shield of hot steam that burns and obscures vision.
Summon a rain of boiling water over an area.
Summon a geyser of water and fire, burning everything it touches.
Release a jet of steam and fire, pushing back and burning targets.
Surround the area with a thick mist of boiling water and steam.
Create a pool of boiling water that scalds anything within.
Summon a dragon made of steam and fire to attack your enemies.
Call forth a wave of water mixed with fire, causing widespread burns.
Turn a body of water into a boiling sea, damaging all within.
Envelop yourself in a layer of steam and fire, scalding attackers.
Release a torrent of boiling water and steam, burning all it touches.
Trap an enemy in a prison of steam and fire, causing constant damage.
Cause an explosion of steam and fire, burning and disorienting enemies.
Call down a rain of fire and steam to scorch the battlefield.
Create a maelstrom of boiling water and fire, trapping and incinerating everything within.
Summon a surge of boiling steam that incinerates and electrocutes all in its path.
Turn an entire body of water into a sea of fire and boiling water.
Unleash the wrath of steam and fire, causing devastation in a wide radius.
